mapper.select: SELECT p.productNum, p.name productName, price, pp.imageFileName FROM product p JOIN productPic pp ON p.productNum = pp.productNum WHERE p.productNum=#{productNum} AND INSTR(pp.imageFileName,'main') > 0

select pr.productNum, requestDate ,pr.name productName,r.requestNum, c.num,c.name, r.total, r.addr1 deliverAddr1, r.addr2 deliverAddr2, r.zip deliverZip, r.tel deliverTel, r.name deliverName, r.memo, r.status, p.payMethod, p.point usePoint, p.purchase,p.stackPoint point, rd.requestDetailNum, rd.productCount, rd.productNum, rd.productSum FROM request r JOIN customerdetail c ON r.num = c.num JOIN requestDetail rd ON r.requestNum = rd.requestNum JOIN product pr ON pr.productNum = rd.productNum JOIN payment p ON r.requestNum = p.requestNum WHERE r.requestNum = #{requestNum}

select pr.productNum, requestDate, pr.name productName, r.requestNum, c.num,c.name, rd.productSum, r.status, rd.productCount, pr.imageFileName from request r JOIN customerdetail c ON r.num = c.num JOIN requestDetail rd ON r.requestNum = rd.requestNum JOIN product pr ON pr.productNum = rd.productNum where r.requestnum=#{requestNum} and c.num=#{num}
SELECT md.num, cd.name, md.userId, md.mileage, cd.email, cd.tel, md.addr1, md.addr2, md.zip FROM customerDetail cd JOIN memberDetail md ON cd.num = md.num WHERE md.num = #{num}
select nvl(count(*), 0) from request r join customer c on c.num=r.num where c.num=#{num}
